objects.text:
• Premium Quality Glass
• Eco-Friendly Bamboo
• Sustainable Solution
• Ideal for Serums & Oils

product_details.name: Eco-Luxe Dropper Bottles with Bamboo Accents | Premium Sustainable Packaging Solution
product_details.description:
• Elegant white and amber glass bottles with precision dropper applicators
• Premium bamboo caps and base elements for an eco-friendly touch
• Perfect for essential oils, serums, and premium cosmetic products
• Minimalist Scandinavian-inspired design aesthetic
• Professional-grade construction ensures leak-proof storage
• Available in multiple sizes to suit various product needs
• Sustainable packaging solution combining glass and natural bamboo
• UV-protective amber glass options to preserve sensitive formulations
• Easy-to-use dropper system for precise dispensing
• Ideal for clean beauty and environmentally conscious brands

banner_details:
This banner features a bifurcated layout with a clean, minimalistic design. The left half showcases a vertical stack of text elements including a bold serif title ("heading"), a geometric sans-serif subtitle ("subheading"), and an elegant tagline in uppercase ("tagline"). Below the tagline, a bullet list ("description") highlights product features. A large, bold price ("price") sits just above a rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background") with white text ("cta"). The right half of the banner displays a realistic image of cosmetic dropper bottles ("product_image") with bamboo caps, conveying the eco-luxury theme. Geometric vector shapes in soft opacity provide subtle decor and balance.

**Color Palette:**
- #F5EFE6 (Cream)
- #E8E0D5 (Light Taupe)
- #4A3F35 (Charcoal Brown)
- #BFB5A8 (Warm Gray)
- #8C7853 (Muted Gold)
- #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image features a minimalistic and earthy color palette that emphasizes natural and organic elements. Dominant colors include amber brown from the glass bottles (#5C3A1E), soft matte white for the dropper caps and labels (#F5F5F5), and light bamboo wood accents (#DDB77A and #B58E58). The clear frosted glass base adds a subtle elegance with its translucent white-gray hue (#D8D8D8). These colors fuse seamlessly, creating contrast without clashing—brown glass glowing warmly against neutral whites, while the bamboo's textured warmth adds dimensional highlights. For an advertisement banner, a palette combining #5C3A1E, #F5F5F5, #DDB77A, #B58E58, and #D8D8D8 would evoke purity and eco-consciousness.
